description: The president will hold a summit to review community relations and police working conditions.
title: France's Macron calls for 'urgent' police reform following protests
title_page: France's Macron calls for 'urgent' police reform following protests - BBC News
maintext: It was a national march against the controversial draft law that showed both sides of the coin Mr Macron is dealing with. It showed the difficulties facing the police - dozens of officers were injured - but it also showed that many people felt the government was on the wrong side of the debate.
